name: Poultry-Geist
description:
This is a puzzle game where you can die  and possess other being in order to finish the levels. This was done for a gamejam using the theme "Die to win" and the optional style of "Food".

  •  Made using unity
  • Made all of the  visual assets used in the game except for the background taken from google images
  • Audio taken from youtube and freesound.org
